{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer VR2800 |revision=v1 |series=AC2800 |asin=B06X3QXNVY;CA; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Europe |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63137U |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |ram1=256 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=VDSL Analog Front End (LD/AFE);Broadcom;BCM6303;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, NitroQAM, VDSL2, ADSL2+, TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''2167''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM), :• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''AC2800'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2800 Wireless MU-MIMO VDSL/ADSL Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-VR2800.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-VR2800}}{{•}}{{ProductPage|https://www.tp-link.com/uk/products/details/Archer-VR2800.html}} (UK) :''160MHz bandwidth technology will follow later by updating'' *[https://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/VR2800V1_Emulator_2017042605/index.htm Interface Simulator] ===Links=== *[https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=it&u=https://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2704218-p-2.html&prev=search ''(TP-LINK) New modem-router dsl coming soon'' on '''HWUpgrade'''] (translated) :CPU/xDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM63137U / BCM6303; Flash: 256MB; RAM: 256MB; :Wireless (2.4/5GHz): [[Broadcom]] BCM43602 / BCM4366 ===See also=== :;[[TP-LINK Archer VR series]] *[[TP-LINK Archer VR1600v]] v1 (AC1600, 4x GbE) :[[Broadcom]] BCM63167 (2x VoIP FXS, 1x USB 2.0)]] *[[TP-LINK Archer VR2100]] v1 (AC2100, 4x GbE) • [https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/dsl-modem-router/archer-vr2100/ PPage] *[[TP-LINK Archer VR2600]] v1 (AC2600) :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 (2x @1.4GHz) :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 512MB :xDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168U/BCM6302 :WLAN: [[QCA]] QCA9980/QCA9980 :Switch: [[QCA]] QCA8337 :4x LAN (GbE), 2x USB 3.0, 4x ant *[[TP-LINK Archer VR2800]] (AC2800) • [https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/dsl-modem-router/archer-vr2800v/ PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63137U (2x @1GHz) :Flash: 256MB, RAM: 256MB :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602/BCM4366 :xDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 :4x LAN (GbE), 2x USB 3.0, 4x ant *[[TP-LINK Archer VR2800v]] (DE) • [https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/dsl-modem-router/archer-vr2800v/ PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63136V (2x @1GHz) :Flash: 512MB, RAM: 256MB :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43602/BCM4366 :xDSL: [[Broadcom]] BCM6303 __NOTOC__
